channel.title: Images on Harvester manual test cases
channel.description: Recent content in Images on Harvester manual test cases

item.title: Add Labels (e2e_be_fe)
item.description:
1. Add multiple labels to the images.
  2. Click save

Expected Results

  1. Labels should be added successfully

item.title: Create Images with valid image URL (e2e_be_fe)
item.description:
1. Create image with cloud image available for openSUSE. http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/Cloud:/Images:/Leap_15.3/images/openSUSE-Leap-15.3.x86_64-NoCloud.qcow2

Expected Results

  1. Image should show state as Active.
  2. Check the backing image in Longhorn

Known Bugs

https://github.com/harvester/harvester/issues/1269

item.title: Create with invalid image (e2e_be_fe)
item.description:
1. Create image with invalid URL. e.g. - https://test.img

Expected Results

  1. Image state show as Failed

item.title: Delete the image(e2e_be_fe)
item.description:
1. Select an image with state active.
  2. Delete the image.
  3. Create another image with same name.
  4. Delete the newly created image.
  5. Delete an image with failed state

Expected Results

  1. The image should be deleted successfully. Check the CRDS VirtualMachineImage.
  2. User should be able to create a new image with same name.
  3. Check the backing image in Longhorn.

item.title: Delete VM with exported image(e2e_fe)
item.description:
• Related issues: #1602 exported image can’t be deleted after vm removed

Verification Steps

  1. create vm “vm-1”
  2. create a image “img-1” by export the volume used by vm “vm-1”
  3. delete vm “vm-1”
  4. delete image “img-1”

Expected Results

  1. image “img-1” will be deleted

item.title: Edit images (e2e_be_fe)
item.description:
1. Edit image.
    • Try to edit the description
    • Try to edit the URL
    • Try to edit the Labels

Expected Results

  1. User should be able to edit the description and Labels
  2. User should not be able to edit the URL

item.title: Update image labels after deleting source VM(e2e_fe)
item.description:
• Related issues: #1602 exported image can’t be deleted after vm removed

Verification Steps

  1. create vm “vm-1”
  2. create a image “img-1” by export the volume used by vm “vm-1”
  3. delete vm “vm-1”
  4. update image “img-1” labels

Expected Results

  1. image “img-1” will be updated

item.title: Upload Cloud Image (e2e_be)
item.description:
1. Upload image to images page
  2. Create new vm with image using appropriate template
  3. Run VM health checks

Expected Results

  1. Image should upload
  2. Health checks should pass

item.title: Upload image that is invalid
item.description:
1. steTry to upload invalid image file to images page
    • Something like dmg, or tar.gzps

Expected Results

  1. You should get an error

Known Bugs

https://github.com/harvester/harvester/issues/1425

item.title: Upload ISO Image(e2e_fe)
item.description:
1. Upload image to images page
  2. Create new vm with image using appropriate template
  3. Run VM health checks

Expected Results

  1. Image should upload
  2. Health checks should pass

item.title: Verify the options available for image
item.description:
1. Create vm with YAML using the menu option.
  2. Download Yaml
  3. Verify the downloaded Yaml file.
  4. Clone the Image

Expected Results

  1. All user-specified fields must match what show on GUI:
    • Namespace
    • Name
    • Description
    • URL
    • Labels
